languages.text: {n}Парень несколько раз открывает и закрывает рот от удивления.{/n} "З-значит... наш брак наконец-то заверят? И Зази теперь тоже сможет стать хирургеоном? Даже не знаю, как вас благодарить, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! В-вот, проходите на мое место, прошу. А я вернусь сюда позже, уже вместе со своей невестой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Парень несколько раз открывает и закрывает рот от удивления.{/n} "З-значит... наш брак наконец-то заверят? И Зази теперь тоже сможет стать хирургеоном? Даже не знаю, как вас благодарить, госпо{mf|дин|жа}! В-вот, проходите на мое место, прошу. А я вернусь сюда позже, уже вместе со своей невестой".
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."

languages.text: {n}年轻人愣了几秒钟，震惊地张开了嘴。{/n}“也……也就是说……我们的婚姻终于可以得到认可了吗？而且萨姿也可以成为一名外科医生了，是吗？我真不知道该如何感谢您，大人！请……请过来吧，请排在我的位置。我下次再来，等我下次再来的时候，就是和我的未婚妻一起来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻人愣了几秒钟，震惊地张开了嘴。{/n}“也……也就是说……我们的婚姻终于可以得到认可了吗？而且萨姿也可以成为一名外科医生了，是吗？我真不知道该如何感谢您，大人！请……请过来吧，请排在我的位置。我下次再来，等我下次再来的时候，就是和我的未婚妻一起来了。”
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}El joven pasa unos segundos abriendo y cerrando la boca, completamente atónito.{/n} «¿E-eso significa que... por fin certificarán nuestro matrimonio? ¿Y Zazi podrá convertirse en cirujana también? ¡No sé cómo agradecérselo, mi{mf|lord|lady}! T-tome, por favor, mi puesto es suyo. Volveré más tarde, esta vez con mi prometida».
languages.original_text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."

T-tome, por favor, mi puesto es suyo. Volveré más tarde, esta vez con mi prometida».
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}若者はショックのあまり、数秒間口をぱくぱくさせる。{/n}「そ、それはつまり…僕らの結婚がゆくゆくは認められるってことですか？ザジもすぐにチラージョンになれるってことですか？なんとお礼を申し上げればよいか、陛下！こ、こちらへどうぞ、順番を代わります。フィアンセを連れて戻ってきますね」
languages.original_text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."

traits.locale_text: {n}若者はショックのあまり、数秒間口をぱくぱくさせる。{/n}「そ、それはつまり…僕らの結婚がゆくゆくは認められるってことですか？ザジもすぐにチラージョンになれるってことですか？なんとお礼を申し上げればよいか、陛下！こ、こちらへどうぞ、順番を代わります。フィアンセを連れて戻ってきますね」
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}Abasourdi, le jeune homme passe plusieurs secondes à ouvrir et refermer la bouche sans mot dire.{/n} « Alors... notre mariage va enfin être entériné ? Et Zazi va pouvoir devenir chirurgeonne, elle aussi ? Je ne sais pas comment vous remercier, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Tenez, je vous en prie, prenez ma place. Je reviendrai plus tard, avec ma fiancée, cette fois. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abasourdi, le jeune homme passe plusieurs secondes à ouvrir et refermer la bouche sans mot dire.{/n} « Alors... notre mariage va enfin être entériné ? Et Zazi va pouvoir devenir chirurgeonne, elle aussi ? Je ne sais pas comment vous remercier, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Tenez, je vous en prie, prenez ma place. Je reviendrai plus tard, avec ma fiancée, cette fois. »
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}Der junge Mann öffnet und schließt mehrere Sekunden lang schockiert den Mund.{/n} "D-Das bedeutet ... unsere Heirat wird endlich zertifiziert? Und Zazi kann jetzt auch eine Chirurgeum werden? Ich weiß gar nicht, wie ich Euch danken soll, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! H-Hier, bitte, nehmt meinen Platz. Ich komme später wieder, dann aber mit meiner Verlobten."
languages.original_text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."

Ich komme später wieder, dann aber mit meiner Verlobten."
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: {n}Hayrete düşen genç adam, birkaç saniye boyunca ağzını açıp kapatıyor.{/n} "Y... Yani... Nihayet evlenmemize izin var mı? Üstelik Zazi artık cerrah olabilecek mi? Size ne kadar teşekkür etsem azdır {mf|lordum|leydim}! Buyurun lütfen, benim yerime geçin. Ben daha sonra nişanlımla döneceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The young man spends several seconds opening and closing his mouth in shock.{/n} "T-that means... our marriage will finally be certified? And Zazi will be able to become a chirurgeon now too? I don't know how to thank you, my {mf|lord|lady}! H-here, please, take my place. I will return later, this time with my fiancée."
